title: Security Officer

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-At the end of each night, you will learn all players that visited someone with a Security Camera on them.
-You will also learn if they were visited by an Evil player, but you wont know how many, and who it is.
-You may only have one Security Camera installed at all times.
-Detection Immune players will show up as good to your Security Camera
-Framed, doused, hexed etc targets will show up as evil to your Security Camera.

desc:
Post 1754
Abilities
-Install a Security Camera at an authorized target's house.
-Destroy a Security Camera.
